quote_last:
.
Darkness again.
Orme groped his way to the door and tugged at the handle. The door would not open; built with air-tight nicety, it did not budge in the least.
quote_raw:
As the match burned close to his fingers, Orme pulled out his watch. It was twenty-nine minutes past five.
Darkness again.
Orme groped his way to the door and tugged at the handle. The door would not open; built with air-tight nicety, it did not budge in the least.
title: The Girl and the Bill
author: Bannister Merwin

quote_last: Father Martin woke himself with a shriek of terror. He jerked up in bed and sat, rigid as a doll, staring wild-eyed into the darkness.
quote_raw: Shortly before five-thirty Father Martin woke himself with a shriek of terror. He jerked up in bed and sat, rigid as a doll, staring wild-eyed into the darkness.
title: Death in Holy Orders
author: P.D. James
